# Base Tools Documentation Index

Project: @base-web-kits/base-tools
Description: Cross-platform utility library (TS/Web/React/Vue/Uni)

## Documentation Structure

### REACT

> Install: `npm i @base-web-kits/base-tools-react`

- [clearCache](/base-tools/api/react/hooks/clearCache)
